languages.text: "Какие-то тщедушные бандиты напали на меня, помазанни{mf|ка|цу} Императора, Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус. Право же, столь плохо организованные покушения можно считать оскорблением!"
"A gang of puny thugs attacked me — the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. Such a poorly organised attempt on my life can only be seen as a personal affront!"
languages.original_text: "Какие-то тщедушные бандиты напали на меня, помазанни{mf|ка|цу} Императора, Вольного Торговца фон Валанциус. Право же, столь плохо организованные покушения можно считать оскорблением!"

traits.locale_text: "A gaggle of impotent thugs attacked me, the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. I say! Such a poorly organized attempt on my life can be considered a personal affront!"
"A gaggle of impotent thugs attacked me, the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. I say! Such a poorly organized attempt on my life can be considered a personal affront!"
"A gang of puny thugs attacked me — the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. Such a poorly organized attempt on my life can only be seen as a personal affront!"
"A gang of puny thugs attacked me — the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. Such a poorly organized attempt on my life can only be seen as a personal affront!"
"A gang of puny thugs attacked me — the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. Such a poorly organised attempt on my life can only be seen as a personal affront!"

languages.text: 「しょうもないチンピラどもが…皇帝に聖別された自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスである私を襲撃するとは。このような稚拙な企てを試みるとは、侮辱としか思えぬ！」
languages.original_text: "A gang of puny thugs attacked me — the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. Such a poorly organised attempt on my life can only be seen as a personal affront!"

traits.locale_text: 「しょうもないチンピラどもが…皇帝に聖別された自由開拓者フォン・ヴァランシウスである私を襲撃するとは。このような稚拙な企てを試みるとは、侮辱としか思えぬ！」

languages.text: “一群微不足道的暴徒竟敢袭击我，帝皇的神选者，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人。这群无组织无纪律的暴徒，竟敢企图谋害我的性命，这是对我个人的侮辱！”
languages.original_text: "A gang of puny thugs attacked me — the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. Such a poorly organised attempt on my life can only be seen as a personal affront!"

traits.locale_text: “一群微不足道的暴徒竟敢袭击我，帝皇的神选者，冯·瓦兰修斯家族的行商浪人。这群无组织无纪律的暴徒，竟敢企图谋害我的性命，这是对我个人的侮辱！”

languages.text: «He sido víctima de una banda de matones de mala muerte al servicio {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente de los von Valancius, {mf|el ungido|la ungida} por el Emperador. ¡No puedo tomarme un atentado tan mal organizado contra mi vida como algo que no sea una afrenta personal!».
languages.original_text: "A gang of puny thugs attacked me — the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. Such a poorly organised attempt on my life can only be seen as a personal affront!"

traits.locale_text: «He sido víctima de una banda de matones de mala muerte al servicio {mf|del|de la} Comerciante Independiente de los von Valancius, {mf|el ungido|la ungida} por el Emperador. ¡No puedo tomarme un atentado tan mal organizado contra mi vida como algo que no sea una afrenta personal!».

languages.text: « Une bande de voyous m'a {mf|attaqué|attaquée}... Moi, l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius. Une tentative d'assassinat aussi mal organisée, j'y vois un affront personnel ! »
languages.original_text: "A gang of puny thugs attacked me — the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. Such a poorly organised attempt on my life can only be seen as a personal affront!"

traits.locale_text: « Une bande de voyous m'a {mf|attaqué|attaquée}... Moi, l'{mf|élu|élue} de l'Empereur, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} von Valancius. Une tentative d'assassinat aussi mal organisée, j'y vois un affront personnel ! »

languages.text: "Eine Bande mickriger Schläger hat mich angegriffen – {mf|den vom Imperator gesalbten Freihändler|die vom Imperator gesalbte Freihändlerin} von Valancius. Ein derart schlecht geplanter Anschlag auf mein Leben kann nur als persönlicher Affront betrachtet werden!"
languages.original_text: "A gang of puny thugs attacked me — the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. Such a poorly organised attempt on my life can only be seen as a personal affront!"

traits.locale_text: "Eine Bande mickriger Schläger hat mich angegriffen – {mf|den vom Imperator gesalbten Freihändler|die vom Imperator gesalbte Freihändlerin} von Valancius. Ein derart schlecht geplanter Anschlag auf mein Leben kann nur als persönlicher Affront betrachtet werden!"

languages.text: "Çelimsiz bir serseri sürüsü bana, İmparator'un bizzat kutsadığı Hür Tacir von Valancius'a saldırdı. Canıma kasteden böylesi beceriksizce teşebbüsleri şahsıma hakaret sayarım!"
languages.original_text: "A gang of puny thugs attacked me — the Emperor's anointed, Rogue Trader von Valancius. Such a poorly organised attempt on my life can only be seen as a personal affront!"

traits.locale_text: "Çelimsiz serserilerden oluşan bir çete bana, İmparator tarafından atanmış Hür Tacir von Valancius'a saldırdı. Yaşamıma kasteden böylesi beceriksizce planları kişisel bir hakaret olarak algılıyorum!"
